all succeeded."},{"lineNumber":259917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259918,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞このイベントの後、全員　レア装備を手に入れる画面が入ります","translatedEnglishLine":"> After this event, a screen where everyone receives rare equipment will appear."},{"lineNumber":259919,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：翔竜山／全景","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Mount Shoryu / Full View"},{"lineNumber":259920,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール達は三度翔竜山に来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile and the others came to Mount Shoryu for the third time."},{"lineNumber":259921,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259922,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人ずつ紹介、エールが語る形で","translatedEnglishLine":"Introduce each person one by one, with Aile speaking."},{"lineNumber":259923,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君、１番初めから着いてきてくれた友達","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun, a friend who has been with us from the very beginning."},{"lineNumber":259924,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じで　立ち絵と一言くらいは言わせてもいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that; it might be nice to let them say a line along with their standing portrait."},{"lineNumber":259925,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヒロインの場合だけＩＦで別台詞（１番最期に出した方がいいかな、その場合は）","translatedEnglishLine":"For heroines only, alternate lines via IF (probably better to show last, if so)."},{"lineNumber":259926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259927,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールは日光を持つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile carries the Sunlight."},{"lineNumber":259928,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスがカオスを持つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Rance carries Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259929,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールは、ダークランスに　リーダーをお願い出来ないかと提案するが","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile suggests to Dark Rance whether he could take on the leader role."},{"lineNumber":259930,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここまでお前がみんなをひっぱってきたんだ、最期までやれ、俺は手伝ってやると","translatedEnglishLine":"You've led everyone this far; see it through to the end, I'll assist you."},{"lineNumber":259931,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセット、そうよ、がんばりなさいとか励ます","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset encourages, \"That's right, do your best.\""},{"lineNumber":259932,"originalJapaneseLine":"では、僕が指揮を引き続きします、みなさんよろしくお願いします","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, I will continue to direct; everyone, please cooperate."},{"lineNumber":259933,"originalJapaneseLine":"作戦の再確認です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's review the plan again."},{"lineNumber":259934,"originalJapaneseLine":"正面から魔王ランスが居るアメージング城を目指します。","translatedEnglishLine":"We aim straight for the Amazing Castle where Demon King Rance resides."},{"lineNumber":259935,"originalJapaneseLine":"多数の魔人、魔物が待ち構えているはずですが、ひとつずつ確実に倒して進みます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Many demons and monsters should be waiting, but we will defeat them one by one reliably and advance."},{"lineNumber":259936,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだな、小細工してひとつのミスでややこしい状態になる方が危険だ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, scheming and making a single mistake that complicates things would be more dangerous."},{"lineNumber":259937,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、それに魔人や魔物は前回もなんとか倒せましたが、今のボク達だとより確実に倒せるはずです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, and although we managed to defeat demons and monsters last time, with our current strength we should be able to defeat them even more reliably."},{"lineNumber":259938,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王ランスと戦う前に護衛の魔人や魔物は全て倒しておきます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Before fighting Demon King Rance, we will defeat all the guard demons and monsters."},{"lineNumber":259939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだね、魔王ランスとの戦い中に援軍でこられたらやばいからね","translatedEnglishLine":"That's true, it would be bad if reinforcements came during the fight with Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":259940,"originalJapaneseLine":"甘く見てはいけないのは魔王ランスです、やはりとんでもなく強いです。","translatedEnglishLine":"We must not underestimate Demon King Rance; he is exceedingly strong."},{"lineNumber":259941,"originalJapaneseLine":"今のボク達でも勝てないと思った方がいいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's better to think that even we now cannot win."},{"lineNumber":259942,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝つ戦いで無く、なんとか隙を作って、リセットさんにビンタをお願いします。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is not a fight to win, but to create an opening somehow, so please ask Reset-san to slap him."},{"lineNumber":259943,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦う目的は、魔王ランスの隙を作る事、その為に全力で挑みます。","translatedEnglishLine":"The purpose of fighting is to create an opening in Demon King Rance; for that we will do our best."},{"lineNumber":259944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、わかった・・倒したかったが、前はそのあたりも曖昧なまま挑んだのがまずかったしな","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I understand... I wanted to defeat him, but last time it was bad that we challenged without clarity on that point."},{"lineNumber":259945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　深根、はい・・私も自分がという気持ちが強く・・今回はリセットさんの支援に徹します","translatedEnglishLine":"Fukane: Yes... I also had strong personal feelings, but this time I will focus on supporting Reset-san."},{"lineNumber":259946,"originalJapaneseLine":"それから、魔王ランスと戦う前に誰かが離脱するような状態になったらいったん退却します。","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, if someone becomes unable to continue before fighting Demon King Rance, we will retreat once."},{"lineNumber":259947,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼく達、全員が万全の状態で魔王ランスの前に立つ事、これも作戦が成功する為の最低条件","translatedEnglishLine":"All of us must stand before Demon King Rance in perfect condition; this is the minimum condition for the plan's success."},{"lineNumber":259948,"originalJapaneseLine":"いこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go."},{"lineNumber":259949,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイが倒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Ray has fallen."},{"lineNumber":259950,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを影から見ていたケイブワン、ケイブニャン・・ひゃーこわい","translatedEnglishLine":"Kave One and Kave Nyan watched this from the shadows... Yikes, scary."},{"lineNumber":259951,"originalJapaneseLine":"こわいすぎる、あの人間","translatedEnglishLine":"That human is too scary."},{"lineNumber":259952,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達が勝てる相手ではない逃げようー","translatedEnglishLine":"They are opponents we cannot win against. Let's run away!"},{"lineNumber":259953,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、アメージング城","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Amazing Castle."},{"lineNumber":259954,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　魔王ランスが立っており、その前面か後ろに彫像を置きます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon King Rance stands, and a statue is placed either in front or behind him."},{"lineNumber":259955,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　魔王ランスの絵がメインですが、ユーザーら彫像の形を見せる事を目的としています","translatedEnglishLine":"The main focus is the picture of Demon King Rance, but the purpose is to show players the shape of the statue."},{"lineNumber":259956,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ランスは、部下からの報告（ビスケッタ、サテラ）を聞きながら、じっと彫像を見ている","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance is quietly looking at the statue while listening to reports from his subordinates (Biscetta, Satera)."},{"lineNumber":259957,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　何か気になる所があり引き付けられるのだが、自分ではまだ分かっていないという感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"There is something that draws his attention and concerns him, but he himself doesn't understand it yet."},{"lineNumber":259958,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259959,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　彫像はサテラがランスに見つかりしぶしぶもってきた氷柱シィルを加工した物","translatedEnglishLine":"The statue is made by processing the icicle Shiru that Satera reluctantly brought after Rance found it."},{"lineNumber":259960,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　氷柱シィルを加工（石像の女とかを重ね、色を付ける）などでシィルの顔部分を隠している","translatedEnglishLine":"The icicle Shiru is processed (by layering a stone statue of a woman and adding color) to hide Shiru's face portion."},{"lineNumber":259961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　適当に組み立てなので、こんなのいらんとランスが言いもちさる事を期待していたサテラだが","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it’s assembled roughly, Satera expected Rance to say he didn’t need it and take it away."},{"lineNumber":259962,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ランスは気に入ってようで玉座の側に置かれたまま","translatedEnglishLine":"But Rance liked it and it remains placed beside the throne."},{"lineNumber":259963,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259964,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタさんが報告","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta-san reports."},{"lineNumber":259965,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山に侵入して来たお子様方ですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The kids who infiltrated Mount Shoryu,"},{"lineNumber":259966,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人サイゼル、魔人ハウゼル、魔人レイ、魔人リズナ、魔人ワーグ、魔人シルキィ、魔人ホーネット様","translatedEnglishLine":"have defeated Demon Saizel, Demon Hauzel, Demon Ray, Demon Rizna, Demon Warg, Demon Silky, and Demon Hornet-sama,"},{"lineNumber":259967,"originalJapaneseLine":"他４つの防衛部隊と６体の大型モンスターを撃破して","translatedEnglishLine":"as well as four other defense squads and six large monsters,"},{"lineNumber":259968,"originalJapaneseLine":"このアメージング城の下層に侵入して来ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"and have entered the lower levels of this Amazing Castle."},{"lineNumber":259969,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは平静に聞いているが、サテラが驚く","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance listens calmly, but Satera is shocked."},{"lineNumber":259970,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだって、途中までは突破されとは思っていたが・・ホーネット様まで・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What? I thought they broke through partway... but even Hornet-sama..."},{"lineNumber":259971,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、今は大元帥閣下が城の精鋭を率いて迎撃にあたっておられますが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, currently the Grand Marshal is leading the castle's elite troops in counterattack..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事に勝利すると、宝箱を発見。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a safe victory, a treasure chest was discovered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中からアームズが隠していたアイテムが手に入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside, we obtained the item Arms had hidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のみんなも戻っていた、全員成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone else had returned as well; all succeeded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞このイベントの後、全員　レア装備を手に入れる画面が入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After this event, a screen where everyone receives rare equipment will appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：翔竜山／全景
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Mount Shoryu / Full View

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達は三度翔竜山に来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile and the others came to Mount Shoryu for the third time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人ずつ紹介、エールが語る形で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Introduce each person one by one, with Aile speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君、１番初めから着いてきてくれた友達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun, a friend who has been with us from the very beginning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じで　立ち絵と一言くらいは言わせてもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that; it might be nice to let them say a line along with their standing portrait.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒロインの場合だけＩＦで別台詞（１番最期に出した方がいいかな、その場合は）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For heroines only, alternate lines via IF (probably better to show last, if so).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは日光を持つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile carries the Sunlight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスがカオスを持つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Rance carries Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、ダークランスに　リーダーをお願い出来ないかと提案するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile suggests to Dark Rance whether he could take on the leader role.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまでお前がみんなをひっぱってきたんだ、最期までやれ、俺は手伝ってやると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've led everyone this far; see it through to the end, I'll assist you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、そうよ、がんばりなさいとか励ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset encourages, "That's right, do your best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、僕が指揮を引き続きします、みなさんよろしくお願いします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, I will continue to direct; everyone, please cooperate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦の再確認です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's review the plan again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面から魔王ランスが居るアメージング城を目指します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We aim straight for the Amazing Castle where Demon King Rance resides.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数の魔人、魔物が待ち構えているはずですが、ひとつずつ確実に倒して進みます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many demons and monsters should be waiting, but we will defeat them one by one reliably and advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、小細工してひとつのミスでややこしい状態になる方が危険だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, scheming and making a single mistake that complicates things would be more dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、それに魔人や魔物は前回もなんとか倒せましたが、今のボク達だとより確実に倒せるはずです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, and although we managed to defeat demons and monsters last time, with our current strength we should be able to defeat them even more reliably.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスと戦う前に護衛の魔人や魔物は全て倒しておきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before fighting Demon King Rance, we will defeat all the guard demons and monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、魔王ランスとの戦い中に援軍でこられたらやばいからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, it would be bad if reinforcements came during the fight with Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甘く見てはいけないのは魔王ランスです、やはりとんでもなく強いです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not underestimate Demon King Rance; he is exceedingly strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のボク達でも勝てないと思った方がいいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better to think that even we now cannot win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ戦いで無く、なんとか隙を作って、リセットさんにビンタをお願いします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is not a fight to win, but to create an opening somehow, so please ask Reset-san to slap him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦う目的は、魔王ランスの隙を作る事、その為に全力で挑みます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The purpose of fighting is to create an opening in Demon King Rance; for that we will do our best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、わかった・・倒したかったが、前はそのあたりも曖昧なまま挑んだのがまずかったしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I understand... I wanted to defeat him, but last time it was bad that we challenged without clarity on that point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根、はい・・私も自分がという気持ちが強く・・今回はリセットさんの支援に徹します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane: Yes... I also had strong personal feelings, but this time I will focus on supporting Reset-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから、魔王ランスと戦う前に誰かが離脱するような状態になったらいったん退却します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, if someone becomes unable to continue before fighting Demon King Rance, we will retreat once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼく達、全員が万全の状態で魔王ランスの前に立つ事、これも作戦が成功する為の最低条件
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of us must stand before Demon King Rance in perfect condition; this is the minimum condition for the plan's success.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイが倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Ray has fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを影から見ていたケイブワン、ケイブニャン・・ひゃーこわい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kave One and Kave Nyan watched this from the shadows... Yikes, scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こわいすぎる、あの人間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That human is too scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が勝てる相手ではない逃げようー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are opponents we cannot win against. Let's run away!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、アメージング城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスが立っており、その前面か後ろに彫像を置きます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Rance stands, and a statue is placed either in front or behind him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスの絵がメインですが、ユーザーら彫像の形を見せる事を目的としています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main focus is the picture of Demon King Rance, but the purpose is to show players the shape of the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、部下からの報告（ビスケッタ、サテラ）を聞きながら、じっと彫像を見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is quietly looking at the statue while listening to reports from his subordinates (Biscetta, Satera).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か気になる所があり引き付けられるのだが、自分ではまだ分かっていないという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is something that draws his attention and concerns him, but he himself doesn't understand it yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彫像はサテラがランスに見つかりしぶしぶもってきた氷柱シィルを加工した物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The statue is made by processing the icicle Shiru that Satera reluctantly brought after Rance found it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷柱シィルを加工（石像の女とかを重ね、色を付ける）などでシィルの顔部分を隠している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The icicle Shiru is processed (by layering a stone statue of a woman and adding color) to hide Shiru's face portion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適当に組み立てなので、こんなのいらんとランスが言いもちさる事を期待していたサテラだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it’s assembled roughly, Satera expected Rance to say he didn’t need it and take it away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは気に入ってようで玉座の側に置かれたまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rance liked it and it remains placed beside the throne.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山に侵入して来たお子様方ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The kids who infiltrated Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、魔人ハウゼル、魔人レイ、魔人リズナ、魔人ワーグ、魔人シルキィ、魔人ホーネット様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have defeated Demon Saizel, Demon Hauzel, Demon Ray, Demon Rizna, Demon Warg, Demon Silky, and Demon Hornet-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他４つの防衛部隊と６体の大型モンスターを撃破して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as well as four other defense squads and six large monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアメージング城の下層に侵入して来ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have entered the lower levels of this Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは平静に聞いているが、サテラが驚く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance listens calmly, but Satera is shocked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだって、途中までは突破されとは思っていたが・・ホーネット様まで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? I thought they broke through partway... but even Hornet-sama...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、今は大元帥閣下が城の精鋭を率いて迎撃にあたっておられますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, currently the Grand Marshal is leading the castle's elite troops in counterattack...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

it might be nice to let them say a line along with their standing portrait."},{"lineNumber":259925,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヒロインの場合だけＩＦで別台詞（１番最期に出した方がいいかな、その場合は）","translatedEnglishLine":"For heroines only, alternate lines via IF (probably better to show last, if so)."},{"lineNumber":259926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259927,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールは日光を持つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile carries the Sunlight."},{"lineNumber":259928,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスがカオスを持つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Rance carries Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259929,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールは、ダークランスに　リーダーをお願い出来ないかと提案するが","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile suggests to Dark Rance whether he could take on the leader role."},{"lineNumber":259930,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここまでお前がみんなをひっぱってきたんだ、最期までやれ、俺は手伝ってやると","translatedEnglishLine":"You've led everyone this far; I also had strong personal feelings, but this time I will focus on supporting Reset-san."},{"lineNumber":259946,"originalJapaneseLine":"それから、魔王ランスと戦う前に誰かが離脱するような状態になったらいったん退却します。","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, if someone becomes unable to continue before fighting Demon King Rance, we will retreat once."},{"lineNumber":259947,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼく達、全員が万全の状態で魔王ランスの前に立つ事、これも作戦が成功する為の最低条件","translatedEnglishLine":"All of us must stand before Demon King Rance in perfect condition; this is the minimum condition for the plan's success."},{"lineNumber":259948,"originalJapaneseLine":"いこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go."},{"lineNumber":259949,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイが倒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Ray has fallen."},{"lineNumber":259950,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを影から見ていたケイブワン、ケイブニャン・・ひゃーこわい","translatedEnglishLine":"Kave One and Kave Nyan watched this from the shadows... translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事に勝利すると、宝箱を発見。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a safe victory, a treasure chest was discovered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中からアームズが隠していたアイテムが手に入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside, we obtained the item Arms had hidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flying Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のみんなも戻っていた、全員成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone else had returned as well; all succeeded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞このイベントの後、全員　レア装備を手に入れる画面が入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After this event, a screen where everyone receives rare equipment will appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：翔竜山／全景
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Mount Shoryu / Full View

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達は三度翔竜山に来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile and the others came to Mount Shoryu for the third time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人ずつ紹介、エールが語る形で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Introduce each person one by one, with Aile speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君、１番初めから着いてきてくれた友達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun, a friend who has been with us from the very beginning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じで　立ち絵と一言くらいは言わせてもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that; it might be nice to let them say a line along with their standing portrait.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒロインの場合だけＩＦで別台詞（１番最期に出した方がいいかな、その場合は）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For heroines only, alternate lines via IF (probably better to show last, if so).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは日光を持つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile carries the Sunlight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスがカオスを持つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Rance carries Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、ダークランスに　リーダーをお願い出来ないかと提案するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile suggests to Dark Rance whether he could take on the leader role.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまでお前がみんなをひっぱってきたんだ、最期までやれ、俺は手伝ってやると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've led everyone this far; see it through to the end, I'll assist you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、そうよ、がんばりなさいとか励ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset encourages, "That's right, do your best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、僕が指揮を引き続きします、みなさんよろしくお願いします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, I will continue to direct; everyone, please cooperate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦の再確認です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's review the plan again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面から魔王ランスが居るアメージング城を目指します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We aim straight for the Amazing Castle where Demon King Rance resides.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数の魔人、魔物が待ち構えているはずですが、ひとつずつ確実に倒して進みます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many demons and monsters should be waiting, but we will defeat them one by one reliably and advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、小細工してひとつのミスでややこしい状態になる方が危険だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, scheming and making a single mistake that complicates things would be more dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、それに魔人や魔物は前回もなんとか倒せましたが、今のボク達だとより確実に倒せるはずです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, and although we managed to defeat demons and monsters last time, with our current strength we should be able to defeat them even more reliably.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスと戦う前に護衛の魔人や魔物は全て倒しておきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before fighting Demon King Rance, we will defeat all the guard demons and monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、魔王ランスとの戦い中に援軍でこられたらやばいからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, it would be bad if reinforcements came during the fight with Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甘く見てはいけないのは魔王ランスです、やはりとんでもなく強いです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not underestimate Demon King Rance; he is exceedingly strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のボク達でも勝てないと思った方がいいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better to think that even we now cannot win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ戦いで無く、なんとか隙を作って、リセットさんにビンタをお願いします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is not a fight to win, but to create an opening somehow, so please ask Reset-san to slap him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦う目的は、魔王ランスの隙を作る事、その為に全力で挑みます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The purpose of fighting is to create an opening in Demon King Rance; for that we will do our best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、わかった・・倒したかったが、前はそのあたりも曖昧なまま挑んだのがまずかったしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I understand... I wanted to defeat him, but last time it was bad that we challenged without clarity on that point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根、はい・・私も自分がという気持ちが強く・・今回はリセットさんの支援に徹します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane: Yes... I also had strong personal feelings, but this time I will focus on supporting Reset-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから、魔王ランスと戦う前に誰かが離脱するような状態になったらいったん退却します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, if someone becomes unable to continue before fighting Demon King Rance, we will retreat once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼく達、全員が万全の状態で魔王ランスの前に立つ事、これも作戦が成功する為の最低条件
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of us must stand before Demon King Rance in perfect condition; this is the minimum condition for the plan's success.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイが倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Ray has fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを影から見ていたケイブワン、ケイブニャン・・ひゃーこわい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kave One and Kave Nyan watched this from the shadows... Yikes, scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こわいすぎる、あの人間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That human is too scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が勝てる相手ではない逃げようー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are opponents we cannot win against. Let's run away!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、アメージング城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスが立っており、その前面か後ろに彫像を置きます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Rance stands, and a statue is placed either in front or behind him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスの絵がメインですが、ユーザーら彫像の形を見せる事を目的としています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main focus is the picture of Demon King Rance, but the purpose is to show players the shape of the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、部下からの報告（ビスケッタ、サテラ）を聞きながら、じっと彫像を見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is quietly looking at the statue while listening to reports from his subordinates (Biscetta, Satera).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か気になる所があり引き付けられるのだが、自分ではまだ分かっていないという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is something that draws his attention and concerns him, but he himself doesn't understand it yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彫像はサテラがランスに見つかりしぶしぶもってきた氷柱シィルを加工した物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The statue is made by processing the icicle Shiru that Satera reluctantly brought after Rance found it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷柱シィルを加工（石像の女とかを重ね、色を付ける）などでシィルの顔部分を隠している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The icicle Shiru is processed (by layering a stone statue of a woman and adding color) to hide Shiru's face portion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適当に組み立てなので、こんなのいらんとランスが言いもちさる事を期待していたサテラだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it’s assembled roughly, Satera expected Rance to say he didn’t need it and take it away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは気に入ってようで玉座の側に置かれたまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rance liked it and it remains placed beside the throne.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山に侵入して来たお子様方ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The kids who infiltrated Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、魔人ハウゼル、魔人レイ、魔人リズナ、魔人ワーグ、魔人シルキィ、魔人ホーネット様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have defeated Demon Saizel, Demon Hauzel, Demon Ray, Demon Rizna, Demon Warg, Demon Silky, and Demon Hornet-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他４つの防衛部隊と６体の大型モンスターを撃破して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as well as four other defense squads and six large monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアメージング城の下層に侵入して来ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have entered the lower levels of this Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは平静に聞いているが、サテラが驚く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance listens calmly, but Satera is shocked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだって、途中までは突破されとは思っていたが・・ホーネット様まで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? I thought they broke through partway... but even Hornet-sama...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、今は大元帥閣下が城の精鋭を率いて迎撃にあたっておられますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, currently the Grand Marshal is leading the castle's elite troops in counterattack...
